review: l have visited several DRs clinic for diabetes treatment but ,i like your tretment method and your attanding staff.........Thankyou
Doctor is good but very costly..common man like me cannot afford to visit him again..fees 1800 is costly

I had visited the doctor for diabetes consultation. My blood sugar levels was varying from 200 to 300 mg. 
The doctor looked into the test reports and explained the outcomes of out of limit values in detail. He was very reassuring. A proper diet plan and suitable medicines was prescribed. Most of my apprehensions linked to diabetes were cleared.

Can’t comment about the doctor but an pathetic clinic and poor attitude of staff around.. 
Better not get treated rather than visiting them..
Very good and satisfactory and well professional Doctor in his field ****** **** ********* and experience while explaining to the patients in a systematic way.
The  first thing you don't have a long wait for the doctor. A very experienced doctor. He is very patient and explains everything in detail . Mine was a happy experience.

Dr is an experienced professional, friendly *** ************ .
Will like to meet him in person for consultation
Dr Taliwala is very experienced and well-known doctor. We have approached him to come out from diabetics. We shall follow his advice and treatment strictly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Highly experienced and friendly doctor. Would surely recommend to others. Very encouraging. Hope to recover

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Experience was very good. There was some confusion about appointment . But still Dr. Talwalkar gave his time and had discussed thoroughly with me.
